short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends you to a URL of your choice when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension does one thing and one thing only. It allows you to set what URL you go to when opening a new tab. You can choose to have the focus stay in the address bar or move to the newly opened page. These two preferences are the only things collected and neither one ever leaves the browser.
